name: CYCLE_CRYO_SPERM
description: Contains information about the sperm that was cryopreserved as part of a fertility treatment cycle.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the cycle record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CRYO_SPERM_ID_NAME
columns.description: Stores a custom ID title for the cryopreservation. If not set, a generated default will be shown to the user, based on the line number.

columns.name: CRYO_SPERM_DATE
columns.description: Stores the date of cryopreservation for sperm.

columns.name: SPERM_EMBRYO_GAMETE_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the cryopreserved sperm source, such as from a partner or donor.

columns.name: SPERM_EMBRYO_GAMETE_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the cryopreserved sperm state at the beginning of the cycle, such as fresh or thawed.

columns.name: CRYO_SPERM_DONOR
columns.description: Stores the cryopreserved sperm donor ID.

columns.name: CRYO_SPERM_COLL_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the cryopreserved sperm's collection method.

columns.name: CRYO_SPERM_VOLUME
columns.description: Stores the cryopreserved sperm's volume in milliliters.

columns.name: CRYO_SPERM_CONCEN
columns.description: Stores the cryopreserved sperm's concentration, in millions per milliliter.

columns.name: CRYO_SPERM_MOTILITY
columns.description: Stores the cryopreserved sperm's motility, in percent.

columns.name: CRYOSPM_PROGRESS_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the cryopreserved sperm's grade of progression.

columns.name: CRYO_SPERM_MORPHOLOGY
columns.description: Stores the cryopreserved sperm's morphology, as a percent that are normal.

columns.name: CRYO_SPERM_FROZ_VIALS
columns.description: Stores the number of vials frozen for cryopreserved sperm.

columns.name: CRYO_SPERM_VOL_PER_VIA
columns.description: Stores the volume per vial for the cryopreserved sperm, in milliliters.

columns.name: CRYO_SPERM_COLLECT_COMMENT
columns.description: Stores the comments for the collection method for the cryopreserved sperm.

columns.name: CRYO_SPERM_COMMENTS
columns.description: Stores cryo specific comment for sperm.
